description: A flexible general schema for constitutive models, allowing optional elastic, plastic, and damage models, with enforced element names. Units can be freely defined by the user.

elastic_parameters.description: Elastic properties of the material (optional). If used, the name must be 'elastic_parameters'.

plastic_parameters.description: Plastic properties of the material, including hardening (optional). If used, the name must be 'plastic_parameters'.

damage_parameters.description: Parameters specific to the damage model (optional). If used, the name must be 'damage_parameters'.

units.description: Units for different physical properties, defined by the user (optional).
